title: (x) heavy sans on David Bowie "Heroes" album cover - Eagle {Phil Baber}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011012834im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BOWIE0001_3784.jpg)

I'm sure this is Futura but can't seem to get those  
amazing quotes or a point at the top of the 'W'  
when I set it in extra bold.  
Any ideas

Simon
author: Mr Brown

comments.content:
ummmmmmmmmmmmm

Draw them yourself??

-----------------------  
Chopper Reid says "Harden the \*\*\*\* up".

Well I would  
But I also need to include body copy in a similar but lighter weight.  
Not sure I fancy paying £300 for font studio at the moment either.  
cheers through  
\*

The album was released in 1977, so this is pre-digital. It's closer to Monotype's version of Benton's [Eagle Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011012834/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/eagle_bold/&sample_text=%E2%80%9CHEROES%E2%80%9D&sample_size=72). Font Bureau's [Eagle](http://web.archive.org/web/20141011012834/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=eagle) is a bit more narrow, but a better digitization with more weights and decent spacing.

Thanks Stephen.  
Thats perfect cheers for sharing the knowledge

Mr B  
\*
